function.name: str_replace_editor

extras.diff:
--- /workspace/aws-cloudformation__cfn-lint__7008855967c67da37eefbb51319ff471c71c3c1a/reproduce_error.py
+++ /workspace/aws-cloudformation__cfn-lint__7008855967c67da37eefbb51319ff471c71c3c1a/reproduce_error.py
@@ -0,0 +1,2 @@
+from cfnlint.rules.resources.route53.RecordSetName import RecordSetName
+from cfnlint.jsonschema import Validator
@@ -1,0 +4,24 @@
+# Sample data to reproduce the E3041 error
+sample_data = {
+    "Resources": {
+        "MyRecordSet": {
+            "Type": "AWS::Route53::RecordSet",
+            "Properties": {
+                "Name": "example.com.",
+                "HostedZoneName": "example.com."
+            }
+        }
+    }
+}
+
+# Initialize the validator and rule
+validator = Validator()
+rule = RecordSetName()
+
+# Run the validation
+errors = list(rule.validate(validator, None, sample_data, {}))
+
+# Print errors
+for error in errors:
+    print(error.message)
+
